Nucleic Acids Research , 2023; gkad235, https: // doi.org / 10.1093 / nar / gkad235 In the originally published version of this manuscript, af filia tion 2 was given as ‘Enzymit, Ness Ziona, Israel’. The af filia tion has been corr ected to ‘Curr ent addr ess: Enzymit, Ness Ziona, Israel’. 23 May 2023 In the originally published version of the article, there were details lacking in the Funding section. Funding for open access charge: Biolojic Design, Ltd.’ instead of: ‘Funding for open access charge: Biolojic Design, Ltd.’ This emendation has been made within the article.
